food_culture_notes: Markthal is a modern food paradise under an iconic arch building
Patatje oorlog (war fries) with peanut sauce and mayo is a classic
Strong Indonesian influence from colonial history - try Roopram Roti for Surinamese
Hagelslag (chocolate sprinkles on buttered bread) is a serious breakfast

unique_modern: rebuilt modern architecture after WWII bombing
